IdpEventLog.name: IdpEventLog
IdpEventLog.description: Represents the Identity Provider Event Log. This log records both problems and successes with inbound SAML or OpenID Connect authentication requests from another app provider. It also records outbound SAML responses when Salesforce is acting as an identity provider.

AppId.description: The ID of the app provider seeking authentication.

AuthSessionId.description: The ID of the authentication session.

ErrorCode.description: The error code for the authentication issue.

IdentityUsed.description: The identity (username) of the user being authenticated.

InitiatedBy.description: The code describing how the authentication request was initiated.

OptionsHasLogoutUrl.description: Whether a logout URL has been assigned to the app. This URL is where users are redirected when they log out.

SamlEntityUrl.description: The authentication URL of the SAML provider.

SsoType.description: The type of SSO. Options are:

Timestamp.description: The date and time on which the event occurred.

UserId.description: The ID of the user seeking authentication.
